name: RunCpptest

author: Parasoft

inputs.name: installDir
inputs.label: C/C++test installation directory:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Installation folder of Parasoft C/C++test. If not specified, the cpptestcli executable must be added to $PATH.

inputs.name: testConfig
inputs.label: Test configuration:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test configuration to be used for code analysis.

inputs.name: compilerConfig
inputs.label: Compiler identifier:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Identifier of a compiler configuration. Ensure you specify the configuration that matches your compiler.

inputs.name: input
inputs.label: Input scope:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Input scope for analysis (typically, cpptestscan.bdf or compile_commands.json, depending on the project type and the build system).

inputs.name: reportDir
inputs.label: Report directory:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Output folder for reports from code analysis.

inputs.name: reportFormat
inputs.label: Report format:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Format of reports from code analysis.

inputs.name: additionalParams
inputs.label: Addtional parameters:
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional parameters for the cpptestcli executable.

inputs.label: Command line pattern:
